title: DrewADA
author: DrewADA
content: HiI am looking to buy a BIN or a method to create trial accounts at RDP providers such as Vultr, Digital Ocean, Azure, Google CloudI am willing to pay good for a stable method/BINContact me here or on discord: Lawjestaw#5137

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: DrewADA on June 10, 2022, 09:14:50 PMI am looking to buy a BIN or a method to create trial accounts at RDP providers such as Vultr, Digital Ocean, Azure, Google CloudI do not understand this and have little doubt about what you want exactly?Do you want to create many free trial accounts on these RDP providers by using different email IDs and identities?
